name: 03 (Ta2 Games Studio)
description:
Life on Mars.... Maybe, We are not alone.

A small team of astronauts, have arrived on Mars, while one of the members, "03" is doing his research. He is contacted by the commander, that there is a certain activity. He must follow the order and go searching. from there, we find out if he is alone or not...

A top down shooter game. Made it in 7 days For the Brackeys Game Jam.

Theme: "You're Not Alone" _______________________________________________________ Please resize the browser window, until you have a more fluid experience.
 "The window adapts its resolution and (it should fit different aspect-ratios) _______________________________________________________ CONTROLS:
  • [W][A][S][D] to move
  • [Mouse] to rotate the player
  • [E] to interact.
  • [Left Mouse Button] to shoot

Thank you!!
